com.enixlin.jmrc.mapper

接口 RuleMapper


  • @Mapper
public interface RuleMapper

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int addRule(Rule rule) 
      int deleteRule(Rule rule) 
      java.util.ArrayList<Rule> getAllRules() 
      Rule getRuleById(Rule rule) 
      int updateRule(Rule rule) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • addRule

        @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true,
         keyProperty="id",
         keyColumn="id")
 @Insert(value="insert into rule (name,url,panel,leaf,icon) value(#{name},#{url}#{panel},#{leaf},#{icon})")
int addRule(Rule rule)

      • getAllRules

        @Select(value="select * from rule ")
java.util.ArrayList<Rule> getAllRules()

      • getRuleById

        @Select(value="select * from rule where id=#{id} ")
Rule getRuleById(Rule rule)

      • updateRule

        @Update(value="update rule set name=#{name},url=#{url},leaf=#{leaf},panel=#{panel},icon=#{icon} where id=#{id}")
int updateRule(Rule rule)

      • deleteRule

        @Delete(value="delete from rule where id=#{id}")
int deleteRule(Rule rule)
